article_title: WellPoint Axes GC, Taps Morgan Lewis Atty As Replacement
article_text:
WellPoint Axes GC, Taps Morgan Lewis Atty As Replacement

Law360, New York (February 24, 2014, 5:00 PM ET) -- WellPoint Inc. has fired its general counsel and tapped a Morgan Lewis & Bockius LLP partner to temporarily take the health insurance giant’s legal reins, the company said Friday.



Thomas C. Zielinski, a partner at Morgan Lewis specializing in advising and defending health insurers, will take over when WellPoint general counsel and executive vice president John Cannon leaves on March 3, a company spokeswoman said.



WellPoint offered no reason for parting ways with Cannon, who served as interim CEO after chief executive Angela F. Braly departed...

To view the full article, register now.
